tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My experience at Dr. Inamdar's Dental Studio was truly remarkable, leaving me with a rich, confident smile that I never thought possible. The treatment process was completely painless, thanks to their expertise and care. What truly sets them apart is their use of cutting-edge technology, which ensured precision and efficiency throughout. Dr. Inamdar and his team's commitment to excellence and patient comfort is evident in every aspect of their practice. I am beyond satisfied with the results and highly recommend Dr. Inamdar's Dental Studio to anyone seeking top-notch dental care and a radiant smile.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Aslam's performance is unbelievable as he extracted one broken tooth and carried out two implants in only 15 minutes without any pain and no stitching was done and I feel personally obliged for painless treatment .I wish him all successes in future Dr Khalida Ansari is also very cooperative and caring
With warm Regards
S Q Shafique

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Was precise to the job and was explaining simultaneously what was she doing and what was the reason for bad teeth. Job was done very nicely without haste and without causing any pain.

Going to a dentist has always been a terrifying and horrifying experience; all you think of is the discomfort and pain. I would avoid going there if it was not for my decaying teeth. However when I saw a dental clinic opening in my area I was almost delighted since I didn't have to travel and of course after my visit I could walk home and rest.
What I look forward to a dental clinic is gentle hands and a clean and hygienic environment and that is exactly how I felt when I visited Dr Aslam Inamdar's clinic in 2003. In fact I got more than what I expected. He was so kind, a little shy and of course gentle and professional in his job.
His new venture of digital smile has brought happiness to many patients young and old. I see the change in people from bad and decaying teeth to beautiful and healthy teeth, and the smile is like 'cherry on the top'. To me Dr Aslam Inamdar is like a friend and after 13 years I can say he has come a long way, not only is he qualified competent and a pro, but he has acquired many accolades for which I am proud and wish him a great success. As Miguel de Cervantes quotes "Every tooth in a Man's head is more valuable than a diamond" if you want to protect your diamond's you know who to call..........of course Dr Aslam.  
 Lawrian Gomes
reply_text: Thank you Lawrian...!!!  13 yearsa !!!!  its long association with your family.Always had great time with you n you have been very co operative during all your visits!

review:
I had a blackish discoloration in my front teeth during my college days itself. My friends use to tell me to get a treatment done for it, as I use to go for work ,on my way I saw Dr Inamdar's dental studio and was attracted with the pictures of Digital Smile Designing and thought of doing my treatment here. When I had my first appointment Dr Inamdar explained me the procedure very well and after that I decided to undergo the treatment of Digital Smile Designing.  The treatment planned with DSD tool is very different from ordinary smile makeover. Dr inamdar is really good at it.Before I use to feel awkward to smile due to the blackish discoloration which were my old metal ceramic crowns..but now Dr Inamdar has changed my smile and I'm happy and satisfied with the treatment provided to me. Now I'm free to give a big smile as Dr Inamdar has changed my smile which contributes in every stage of my life.
            I'm thankful to the doctor and the staff for the cooperation. They made me feel like I'm home. I would recommend the doctor to all my family members and friends too.

I am 65 yes old. my previous dentist had done few metal ceramic bridges in my mouth. Food particles used to get stuck around those bridges and used to make me uncomfortable. I visited Dr.Inamdar's Dental studio on one of my friend's recommendation. He replaced my old metal bridges with ceramic, also I got dental implants for my missing teeth which was painless  procedure !! and above all I had gaps in teeth and old dental work had developed cooked smile for which l underwent smile make over procedure. My god !! my life changed after that. The dental implants provide me ability to chew whatever food I want but the smile makeover procedure gave me lot of confidence. I feel I am not 65 but 50 year old!!! A great psychological boots up for me. Thanks to Dr Inamdar and his digital smile design technology. Its been 2years I have been treated here and I visited for routine check up now. The work done for me is absolutely fine. I am very very happy and pleased with Dr Inamdar's  Dental Studio.I highly recommend every one .Be it dental implants or smile makeover just go for it !!! Very gentle, caring and soft handed Dr Inamdar n his team . keep it up...

Am Ranjan malesha frm Mumbai 
I had multiple dental problems..I came to dr Aslam 4 just small treatment only 4 front tooth n dr Aslam examined and suggested a sole makeover due to years of untreated issues with my teeth.i had multiple implants and restoration and completely new amazing smile with new concept of natural restoration I was told.i must say I am more than happy and satisfied and it has add a major difference to my life and confidence and I can‚Äôt stop smiling.the overall process was few months but almost painless and done with a very caring and patient attitude.i am very happy with results and would definitely recommend dr Aslam for anyone wishing to have a better smile. Thanks is very small word..my smile is back...many many thanks Dr Aslam
They are very good with their work and are very gentle throughout the treatment. Worth the time and everything

I had come for my husband a treatment.... N then had my routine check up done.....Dr Aslam Inamdar gave us a good treatment needed for our tooth.....He always explained us about the treatment he's giving n how effective will it be after the completion.
During every meet he was friendly n polite.
The procedure was painless, the staff is friendly, n we need not to worry about our appointment..... Every time whenever we have an appointment we always get a reminder call n a text msg from the clinic. I would recommend every one to visit Inamdar Dental Clinic for their dental treatment.
reply_text: thank you.Pleasure to treat your family.

review:
I came to know about this clinic because it right next to where I stay. My mom first started the treatment for her dentures. Eventually I was in urgent need of a dentist cause I never bothered about my cavities. In June 2016, I started my dental implant treatment at IDS. I hate injections even though my parents are from a medical background. After 2 visits my fear for injection and the crazy scary fantasy of how horrible and painful the dental procedures can be, was taken away. Dr. Pranav Anandpara gave me the anesthesia which was so smoothly done that the next time I came and requested him only, to do the needful for me. 
The clinic is very clean and all the dental equipments completely sterilized. My treatment is almost done. I no longer fear to visit my dentist. And in fact I recommend Dr. Inamdar for any kind of dental procedures. Glad to have been treated by a Dr. who is calm and cool  and thorough in his work.
-Nicholas Mohite
reply_text: Thank you. we value our association.It was pleasure to treat you for your dental problems.

review:
It was worst !

I had visited the clinic in may and they have finished my RC by may ! 
It is july now and still they haven't provide me cap and now they are saying that you have to remove your tooth. 

I have paid entire amount and now it feels like cheating..they took many xrays before the RC and now all of sudden they are saying that our medicine didn't suited you,your tooth was like this like that ! What a joke...are you fooling us and your profession??  I will never recommend you anywhere...who will take the responsibility for any infection in my tooth?

stop cheating people for money !  

Shame
reply_text:
dear Bhavesh 
Sincere Apologies for not been able to provide you a happy outcome as for my 1000s of other patients..
 My specialist doctor tried her best to save your tooth.
As you were recommended by your own family members who have been getting treatment at our clinic for past 15 years without any issues.

we took many X rays during treatment ..that shows we are sincere to provide cure to our esteemed patients. Its unfortunate that your tooth didnot respond favorably to the treatment provided.
As a doctor we can do our best but still there are certain things beyond control..Hope you understand that.

review:
I initially came with the problem of cavities and gum visibility. However, after a couple of sessions, I found the treatment very effective and enrolled to have smile correction done with digital smile design. 

Its been a year I have done this treatment and it has brought a significant change in my overall personality and confidence. Moreover, I did not face any dental issues throughout the year. 

What encouraged or motivated me to undergo treatment with Dr. Aslam Inamdar is the flexibility in appointments, time devoted towards my treatment, cooperation of the staff and follow up on my oral health.

I am really satisfied with the services and would like to recommend my friends and family to him for dental issues if any in the future.

The overall experience with Dr Inamdar is excellent from past 15yrs..he has been taking good care of all my dental related problems were easily and conveniently..he has given good guidance for my problems and has done it quite efficiently..and I haven't got any issues with his work..he is the best cosmetic Dentist people can't even notice the difference between original and cosmetic tooth...in my opinion best Dentist and very friendly ...feels comfortable dont have to get scared of the dental instruments as I use to be...the best and highly experienced and knowledgeable Dr. I do recommend to all.

Dr.Aslam Inamdar is indeed good at his work *** ** ** ******** *** ****** ****** * **** **** **** ****** ** ** ***** Being humble would cost him nothing I guess especially when you are dealing with such a sensitive treatment. However, the treatment has been good so far but I guess he surely needs to work on customer relations or no one would want to revisit here.

I had a very new and interesting experience with dental studio clinic....I have never seen such an accurate and proper practice and they treated me very well and I would definitely recommend anyone to Dr Aslam inamdar....Good work,would like to see the same work again....thank you.
reply_text: Thank you. It was pleasure to work for you Zartash!

review: I believe Dr. Aslam has truly mastered his craft and yet he is so humble and pleasant in appearance and communication. His zeal for dentistry reflects in his trained assistant doctors, one of which I'll recommend is Dr. Neha, coz she addresses the issue and treats very gently and genuinely, also the staff is approachable, hygienic clinic. Orthodontist Munira is also good.

review:
We have known Dr Aslum for more than 10 years now and my entire family goes to him for dental treatment & care.  I remember once he pulled out my records that we more than five years old and I was just amazed to see him remember those details so easily.  He has always provided the best advice to us on not just the key procedures but also advance treatments for my entire family. 

He is very approachable and friendly ‚Ä¶.

Excellent coordinated team work with proper discussion with customers to explain and agree for the work and related time frame and expenses. While all these things are OK, the surrounding place is not good,try to change it to dental nursing home nearby or shift to Kohinoor or Kalina,and charge reasonably.
